chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
The phone is not in order like this. It's dirty and has scratches on the case, everything is unclean between the case and screen. I want to return the phone. This is not excellent quality.
Thank you for your help,

Hello Doris, You can find your return label attached to this message. Your return will be handled by Chronopost. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. A list of locations can be found here: To prepare your return: 1. Follow the instructions on how to return an item here: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that were delivered with your product. 3. Remove any protective cover or film from your product. 4. Pack your product and its accessories according to the tips below: How to pack your product: • The box should be strong and sturdy, and your product should be placed inside so it won't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a replacement label inside to identify your shipment if the original label is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before you send it. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transport. Your return is now ready for pickup! We'll let you know as soon as it arrives at our location. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear ecomobile,

customer sent device for a refund. Please keep in mind that you have 2 business days to refund the order after receiving the package.


Kind Regards,
Derya from the Back Care Team

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their refund.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button at the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion


Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Belgin Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
